# Book Tools ğŸ“š

> A powerful toolkit for creating and managing multi-format, multi-language books

Book Tools helps you create beautiful books in multiple formats (PDF, EPUB, MOBI, HTML, DOCX) from markdown files, with support for multiple languages, chapters, and advanced formatting options.

## âœ¨ Key Features

- ğŸ“¦ **Multi-format Output**: Generate books in PDF, EPUB, MOBI, HTML, and DOCX
- ğŸŒ **Language Support**: Build books in multiple languages with parallel content
- ğŸ“‘ **Chapter Management**: Create and organize chapters with automatic numbering
- ğŸ”„ **Smart Building**: Only process changed content for faster builds
- ğŸ³ **Docker Support**: Containerized building with all dependencies included
- ğŸ”§ **GitHub Actions**: Built-in CI/CD workflows for automated builds
- ğŸ“ **Markdown-based**: Write in plain text with rich formatting options
- ğŸ¨ **Customizable**: Templates, styles, and formatting options

## ğŸš€ Quick Start

```bash
# Install Book Tools
curl -sSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/iksnae/book-tools/main/install.sh | bash

# Create a new book
book-tools create my-awesome-book

# Create a chapter
book-tools create-chapter

# Build your book
book-tools build
```
